meanings.definition: To cause to shiver or tremble.
meanings.sent1: The cold wind beshivers the little puppy.
meanings.sent2: The scary movie beshivers me every time.
meanings.sent3: The thought of spiders beshivers me, but they are tiny!
meanings.sent4: The thrilling roller coaster ride beshivers my whole body.
meanings.sent5: The ghost story beshivers the children around the campfire.

meanings.definition: To be filled with fear or anxiety.
meanings.sent1: The dark forest beshivers the lost hiker.
meanings.sent2: I beshivers at the idea of speaking in front of a crowd.
meanings.sent3: The upcoming exam beshivers the students, but they are prepared.
meanings.sent4: The eerie silence of the abandoned house beshivers my soul.
meanings.sent5: The loud thunder beshivers the scared cat under the bed.

meanings.sent1: The earthquake beshivers the ground beneath our feet.
meanings.sent2: The old washing machine beshivers violently during the spin cycle.
meanings.sent3: The tiny leaf beshivers in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent4: The excitement in her voice beshivers with anticipation.
meanings.sent5: The engine of the car beshivers as it struggles up the steep hill.
